flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: It is timid, andnalways curls it­nself up in a ball.fIf attacked, itnflares up its backnfor protection.
It usually staysnhunched over.nIf it is angry orfsurprised, itnshoots flames outnof its back.
The fire thatnspouts from itsnback burns hottestfwhen it is angry.nThe flaring flamesnintimidate foes.
CYNDAQUIL protects itself by flaring upnthe flames on its back.nThe flames are vigorous if the POKéMONfis angry. However, if it is tired, thenflames splutter fitfully with incompletencombustion.
CYNDAQUIL protects itself by flaring upnthe flames on its back.nThe flames are vigorous if the POKéMONfis angry. However, if it is tired, thenflames splutter fitfully with incompletencombustion.
It flares flames from its back to protectnitself. The fire burns vigorously if thenPOKéMON is angry. When it is tired,nit sputters with incomplete combustion.
It usually stays hunched over. If it isnangry or surprised, it shoots flames outnof its back.
It is timid and always curls itself up inna ball. If attacked, it flares up its backnfor protection.
It has a timid nature. If it isnstartled, the flames on its backnburn more vigorously.
It has a timid nature. If it isnstartled, the flames on its backnburn more vigorously.
It has a timid nature. If it isnstartled, the flames on its backnburn more vigorously.
It is timid, and always curls itselfnup in a ball. If attacked, itnflares up its back for protection.
It usually stays hunched over.nIf it is angry or surprised, itnshoots flames out of its back.
Ce Pokémon est un grand timide.nLes flammes sur son dos s’intensifientnlorsqu’il prend peur.
It has a timid nature. If it isnstartled, the flames on its backnburn more vigorously.
Ce Pokémon est un grand timide.nLes flammes sur son dos s’intensifientnlorsqu’il prend peur.
It has a timid nature. If it isnstartled, the flames on its backnburn more vigorously.
It has a timid nature. If it isnstartled, the flames on its backnburn more vigorously.
It has a timid nature. If it isnstartled, the flames on its backnburn more vigorously.
おくびょうで　いつも　からだをnまるめている。おそわれると　せなかのnほのおを　もえあがらせ　みをまもる。
겁이 많아서 늘 몸을 웅크리고n있다. 습격당하면 등의 불꽃을n타오르게 해서 몸을 보호한다.
Il est timide et se roule en boule pour se protéger.nAttaqué, il s’enflamme le dos pour riposter.
Es ist ruhig und kugelt sich stets zusammen.nZum Schutz entflammt es seinen Rücken.
Es tímido y siempre se enrosca como una pelota.nSi es atacado, enciende su lomo para protegerse.
Spesso se ne sta appallottolato giacché timido. Senè attaccato, si difende infuocando il dorso.
It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball.nIf attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
臆病で　いつも　体を　まるめている。n襲われると　背中の　炎をn燃え上がらせて　身を守る。
おくびょうな　せいかく。nおどろくと　せなかの　ほのおがnいちだんと　つよく　もえあがる。
겁쟁이 같은 성격이다.n놀라면 등의 불꽃이n한층 더 강하게 타오른다.
Ce Pokémon est un grand timide. Les flammes surnson dos s’intensifient lorsqu’il prend peur.
Erschrickt sich dieses scheue Pokémon,nlodern die Flammen auf seinem Rücken kräftiger.
Es un Pokémon muy tímido. Si se asusta, las llamasnde su lomo arden con más fuerza.
È riservato per natura. Se viene spaventato, lenfiamme sul suo dorso bruciano ardentemente.
It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames onnits back burn more vigorously.
臆病な　性格。n驚くと　背中の　炎がn一段と　強く　燃え上がる。
せなかから　ほのおを　ふきあげて　みを　まもる。nおこった　ときの　ほのおは　いきおいが　いいがnつかれている　ときは　ふかんぜんねんしょうする。
등에서 불꽃을 내뿜어 몸을 지킨다.n화났을 때의 불꽃은 기운차지만n지쳤을 때는 불완전연소한다.

Héricendre se protège en faisant jaillir des flammes denson dos. Ces flammes peuvent être violentes si le Pokémonnest en colère. Cependant, s’il est fatigué, seules quelquesnflammèches vacillent laborieusement.

Feurigel lässt Flammen aus seinem Rücken lodern, wennnes sich schützen muss. Die Flammen sind sehr verzehrend,nwenn dieses Pokémon wütend ist. Ist es aber müde,nflackern die Flammen nur unregelmäßig und schwach.

Cyndaquil se protege soltando llamas por el lomo. Cuandonestá enfadado, las llamas son fieras, pero, si está cansado,nsolo consigue echar algunas chispas que no llegan a cuajarnen una completa combustión.

Cyndaquil si protegge grazie alle fiamme che gli ardononsul dorso. Le fiamme divampano impetuose se il Pokémonnè adirato. Tuttavia, quando è stanco diventano fiammelleninnocue dalla combustione incompleta.
Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back.nThe flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if itnis tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.
背中から　炎を　噴き上げて　身を　守る。n怒った　ときの　炎は　勢いが　いいがn疲れている　ときは　不完全燃焼する。
せなかから　ほのおを　ふきあげて　みを　まもる。nおこった　ときの　ほのおは　いきおいが　いいがnつかれている　ときは　ふかんぜんねんしょうする。
